page.title: 07A pantomime song (cont'd).
page.content:
2 {St.John's had a leaky roof { That let in all the rain. { It needed lots of pennies { To put it right again. { First we started praying, {Then we set about the task { Of raising 80 thousand pound { Yes! that's all we ask. Chorus 3 {Stansted had a railway bridge { That needed pulling down. { To make the line electric, { To take the folk to town. { First they put up notices { Saying please divert. { Then traffic lights { For us to beat { And keep us all alert. Chorus
The chorus to each verse can be found on text page 6.
